operation.name: insert
operation.sqlmap: insert into project_financial_trade_redeem(trade_id,flow_no,project_code,apply_id,redeem_price,redeem_num,redeem_principal,redeem_interest,redeem_interest_rate,redeem_time,redeem_reason,raw_add_time) values (#tradeId#, #flowNo#, #projectCode#, #applyId#, #redeemPrice.cent#, #redeemNum#, #redeemPrincipal.cent#, #redeemInterest.cent#, #redeemInterestRate#, #redeemTime#, #redeemReason#, #rawAddTime#) <selectKey resultClass ="long" keyProperty ="tradeId" > SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID </selectKey>

operation.name: findByCondition
operation.sqlmap: SELECT * from project_financial_trade_redeem where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="projectFinancialTradeRedeem.tradeId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> trade_id = #projectFinancialTradeRedeem.tradeId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="projectFinancialTradeRedeem.applyId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> apply_id = #projectFinancialTradeRedeem.applyId# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="projectFinancialTradeRedeem.projectCode" prepend=" and "> project_code = #projectFinancialTradeRedeem.projectCode# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="projectFinancialTradeRedeem.flowNo" prepend=" and "> flow_no = #projectFinancialTradeRedeem.flowNo# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="redeemTimeStart" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start}redeem_time >= #redeemTimeStart#${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="redeemTimeEnd" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start}redeem_time <= #redeemTimeEnd#${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty> </dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="sortCol" prepend=" order by "> $sortCol$ <isNotEmpty property="sortOrder"> $sortOrder$ </isNotEmpty> </isNotEmpty> LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#;

operation.name: findByConditionCount
operation.sqlmap: SELECT count(*) FROM project_financial_trade_redeem where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="projectFinancialTradeRedeem.tradeId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> trade_id = #projectFinancialTradeRedeem.tradeId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="projectFinancialTradeRedeem.applyId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> apply_id = #projectFinancialTradeRedeem.applyId# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="projectFinancialTradeRedeem.projectCode" prepend=" and "> project_code = #projectFinancialTradeRedeem.projectCode# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="projectFinancialTradeRedeem.flowNo" prepend=" and "> flow_no = #projectFinancialTradeRedeem.flowNo# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="redeemTimeStart" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start}redeem_time >= #redeemTimeStart#${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="redeemTimeEnd" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start}redeem_time <= #redeemTimeEnd#${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
